sections: Title & Summary — one-line capability description and key persona.
Prerequisites — auth scopes, required headers, environment selection.
Endpoint Details — method, URL, path/query params, headers, rate limits.
Request Examples — curl + SDK snippets (TypeScript, Python, Go, Java).
Response Schema — fields table with types, nullability, example payload.
Error Handling — status codes, error bodies, retry guidance.
Test Console / Try It — link or instructions for interactive testing.
